code: var initState=0;export default function countReducer(){var prevState=arguments.length>0&&arguments[0]!==undefined?arguments[0]:initState;var action=arguments.length>1?arguments[1]:undefined;var type=action.type,data=action.data;switch(type){case"increment":return prevState+data;case"subscribe":return prevState-data;default:return prevState;}}
